\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	{X_0} \&\&\&\&\&\& A \\
	\\
	{X_\delta} \&\& {X_{\delta+1}} \&\& {X_\alpha} \&\& B
	\arrow["m", from=1-1, to=1-7]
	\arrow["{f_{\delta,0}}"', from=1-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["g", from=1-7, to=3-7]
	\arrow["{s_\delta}", from=3-1, to=1-7]
	\arrow["{f_{\delta+1, \delta}}"', from=3-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{s_{\delta+1}}"', dashed, from=3-3, to=1-7]
	\arrow["{f_{\alpha , \delta+1}}"', from=3-3, to=3-5]
	\arrow["n"', from=3-5, to=3-7]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
